scripts.build: npm run build:babel:commonjs && npm run build:babel:esmodules && npm run build:typescript:commonjs && npm run build:typescript:esmodules
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix && npm run bump:babel
scripts.bump:babel: npm run bump:babel:commonjs && npm run bump:babel:esmodules
scripts.bump:babel:commonjs: cat babel.commonjs.config.json | jq --arg CORE_JS_VERSION `cat node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version` '(.plugins[] | select(.[0] == "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"))[1].version = $CORE_JS_VERSION' | prettier --parser json > babel.commonjs.config.json.tmp && mv babel.commonjs.config.json.tmp babel.commonjs.config.json
scripts.bump:babel:esmodules: cat babel.esmodules.config.json | jq --arg CORE_JS_VERSION `cat node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version` '(.plugins[] | select(.[0] == "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"))[1].version = $CORE_JS_VERSION' | prettier --parser json > babel.esmodules.config.json.tmp && mv babel.esmodules.config.json.tmp babel.esmodules.config.json
scripts.bump:dev: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '(.devDependencies // {}) | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.devDependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.bump:prod: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '(.dependencies // {}) | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.dependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.postbump: cat package.json | jq '. + (.dependencies = (((.dependencies // {}) + (.localPeerDependencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries)) | (.devDependencies = (((.devDependencies // {}) + (.localPeerDevDependencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries))' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.prebump: cat package.json | jq '(((.localPeerDependencies // {}) | keys | map(["dependencies", .])) + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // {}) | keys | map(["devDependencies", .]))) as $localPeerPaths | delpaths($localPeerPaths)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:eslint && npm run precommit:typescript:production && npm run precommit:typescript:test
